list-item.p: Centrifugation: the sample was centrifuged at 9000 G for 30 min. If it did not show any phase separation, the heating-cooling cycle was performed.

Heating-cooling cycle: the sample underwent three cycles from refrigerator temperature (4 °C) to 40 °C, with a storage period at each temperature of 48 h. If stable at these temperatures, the freeze-thaw cycle was performed.
Freeze-thaw cycle: three freeze-thaw cycles between −21 °C and +25 °C were performed, with a storage time at each temperature of 48 h.
